Oven baked wings
with frank's hot sauce

Ingredients

ingredidents quantity
chicken wings 1 lbs
baking powder 1 tea
kosher salt 1 tea
butter 1.5 tbl
hot sauce 1.5 tbl

Directions

  1. making the wings
    • preheat oven to 450F, racks on upper middle position
    • dry wings, combine with baking powder and salt
    • prepare tray with oil on top rack, foil on bottom
    • place wings on tray and rest uncovered 8 to 24 hours.(20 min for us)
    • add wings and cook for 20 minutes, flip wings and cook for 15-30 minutes
  2. making the sauce
    • medium heat, wisk sauce and butter
  3. combine wings and sauce

Reference: kenji
